param.message: Are you sure you want to load the Sample Data? This will create a new tab and several fields on the new tab.

param.default: This will load sample data into the Joomla Community Builder component. Precisely, an additional information tab (that you can change, unpublish or delete in CB Tabs manager) will be created containing fields for: location, occupation, interests, company, address, city, state, zipcode, country, phone and fax (you can then change, unpublish or delete those fields which you don't need in CB Fields Manager). Also a users-list will be created, that you can edit from the CB Lists manager. This will help you get started quicker with CB.

param.message: Are you sure you want to load the Canvas Layout? This will move multiple tabs, fields, and change their displays.

param.default: This will load the canvas profile layout into the Joomla Community Builder component. Tab positions and displays will be changed to correctly move data for Canvas display. Fields will also have their displays adjusted as needed to fit within the Canvas display needs.

param.message: Are you sure you want to Synchronize Joomla users to Community Builder?

param.default: This will synchronize the Joomla User table with the Joomla Community Builder User Table.
